entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
